channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Leaves, 12th November
item.description:
Speaking to our street cleaner this morning he said he has no obligation to sweep our side of the road?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Josephine Avenue, Brixton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Human forest bikes blocking pavement and cycle stand, 12th November
item.description:
There are Human forest bikes blocking pavement and cycle stand outside the slip slow coffee shop at lisson Grove. The bikes need to be removed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 75, Lisson Grove, Marylebone, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: New bedding plants need replanting, 12th November
item.description:
It looks like someone has pulled up a lot of the bedding plants that have recently been planted. Please can you re attend and replant them. Thanks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stockwell Close, Plaistow, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large gaps between newly laid cobbles, 12th November
item.description:
The new pathway has cobbles at the end. Please can they be finished off and the gaps filled as pram wheels keep getting stuck in the gaps. Thanks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rochester Avenue, Widmore, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Heaps of leaves, 12th November
item.description:
Heaps and heaps of leaves continuous building up on even numbers side of Little Heath Charlton

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Little Heath, Charlton

item.title: The whole street, 12th November
item.description:
The street has leaves everywhere since last month. We can’t even see the pavement neither what is hidden under. It is also slippery.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kingswood Avenue, London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Street cleaning - Grass verges / Shrub beds - Littering

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Chase, Widmore, London

item.title: Approx 30cm pothole, 12th November
item.description:
Pothole has been here a couple of weeks and is getting bigger.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Prince Consort Drive, Chislehurst, London

item.title: Gibbon road with the junction of oakdale road near nunhead train station is urgent need of resurfacing the potholes and patchwork quilt sub standard road repairs are a danger to pedestrians and cyclists, 12th November
item.description:
Gibbon road, near the entrance to Nunhead train station is in urgent need of resurfacing, I have nearly come off my bike whilst trying to navigate this abomination of a road . This road is in urgent Need of resurfacing. Southwark council are not doing there duty I’m keeping road surfaces safe

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Linden Grove, Nunhead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large plank of wood bolted to a public tree, 12th November
item.description:
Location: behind the three large composters in Bromley Palace Park. Someone has recently bolted a very large plank of wood through one of our park trees in order to hold up their new fence. It’s in the same location where the people with the new fence flytipped all their rubbish into the park.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Chase, Widmore, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Light not working, 12th November
item.description:
The alleyway connection between Llanover and Whitworth has a non working light just before the steps . This is making it difficult to negotiate as soon as it becomes dark , these steps are steep and narrow with no hand rail .It creates an area that feels very unsafe especially for mums with buggies and elderly who use it to go to the Doctors Surgery .
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Brent Road, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Water coming up through crack in pavement, 12th November
item.description:
This past week water has been coming up through the crack in the pavement in front of 20 Allenswood Road

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Allenswood Road, Eltham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cones to save parking space, 12th November
item.description:
Repeates issue. Someone leaves two parking cones to save a parking space. Usually a black BMW SUV parked here. Please enforce the law.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 25, Versailles Road, Crystal Palace, London
